name: companion-module-soundbyte
description: BitFocus Companion module for SoundByte sound board application
author: SoundByte

companion.name: SoundByte
companion.description: Control your SoundByte sound board with play/stop buttons and red feedback for playing sounds
companion.help: This module allows you to control your SoundByte application. Configure the host IP (same as port, default 3000) and you'll get presets for all sounds in your /sounds folder with start/stop functionality and red feedback when sounds are playing.
